data.summary_suggestion: Get New York Times Critics' Picks by type
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a list of New York Times Critics' Picks movie reviews filtered by resource type. The resource-type parameter specifies the category of picks to retrieve (e.g., 'all', 'full-time', 'part-time'). Returns an array of Critic objects containing critic information and their pick details. This operation is useful for discovering curated movie recommendations from NYT critics.
data.reasoning: Operation has no summary or description, making it impossible for AI agents to understand its purpose. Added clear action verb, explained the resource-type parameter, specified return type (Critic objects), and provided context about the operation's utility for discovering critic picks.

data.summary_suggestion: Search New York Times movie reviews by keyword
data.description_suggestion: Searches the New York Times movie reviews database by keyword and optional filters. Accepts up to 7 parameters including search query, sort order, and pagination controls. Returns a list of Movie objects matching the search criteria, each containing review details, ratings, and critic information. Supports filtering and sorting to refine results. Requires API key authentication.
